lender.name: John Shapiro
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that all people deserve the opportunity to make a better life for themselves. I feel blessed to have had so much opportunity growing up in the United States, and I am thankful to be able to play a small part in giving other folks an opportunity that seems like makes a real difference in their life. I really like the Kiva.org concept as it seems very direct/efficient/personal/not wasteful. This system seems like it truly creates opportunity for people to improve their circumstances who might not otherwise have that chance, all via their own efforts and work.
lender.occupational_info: For work, I teach guitar and voice lessons from my home. I plan to move into doing nonprofit creation/consulting in the not to distant future and am currently spend much of my non teaching time founding/creating a nonprofit: CooperativeAction.org is: A nonprofit organization that uses an interactive website to facilitate participation among individuals to solve commonly agreed upon issues through cooperative action.. We are not up and running yet but should be by April 2007

lender.name: joshua & stella
lender.loan_because: We want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Joshua is a specialist on diamonds, colored stones, watches and all jewelery. Stella is a manufacturer of jewelry.

lender.name: Eli
lender.loan_because: I support the idea of empowering people to improve their situation for the long term. Micro finance is not a hand out that provides temporary relief...it is a tool that enables people to achieve their dream of a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am the chief lawyer for a company that provides medical services.

lender.name: Wayne and Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe in enriching people\'s lives and empowering them to live their dreams through the delivery of capital they might not otherwise have access to.

lender.name: Jacob Singh
lender.loan_because: I've got enough, and micro lending is typically more successful than straight away charity.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites for ngos and people I believe in.

lender.name: Kathleen & Scott
lender.loan_because: Life has blessed us in many ways, and to whom much is given, much is expected. We are honored to have this opportunity to share.
lender.occupational_info: Kathleen writes books for children and teens. Scott sells software.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do. If I can make the world better and help someone create a business that will provide for themselves and their families I want to help them to achieve that goal.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get loans to purchase or refinance homes.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Just a small investment (in US terms) can be the "tipping point" for an entrepreneur in so many places around the world. The difference between real success and stagnation can be as little as being able to buy some supplies with enough left over to realize a profit.
lender.occupational_info: I help small non-profit businesses organize information about their clients and supporters. My focus is on small organizations that help improve other people's lives.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I can, because I'm thankful for what I have, and because I respect hardwork and integrity. Everyone deserves a chance to make something for themselves and If I can help, I will.

lender.name: Marriah
lender.loan_because: It helps those in need and it helps me save money simultaneously. I love win-win situations.
lender.occupational_info: I study and teach political science as I work toward obtaining my Ph.D.

lender.name: ÁKOS
lender.loan_because: Helping the disadvantaged is not only an awesome feeling, but it is the right thing to do, if you are blessed enough to be able to help... and if you can afford a pizza for yourself, then you can probably afford to help the poor. Consider this: while a pizza will only feed you for a day (?) donating the price of that pizza may help to feed a family for life... Plus you need to cut back on your calories anyways. ;)
lender.occupational_info: FEELGOOD INVESTOR [feel•good in•vés•ter] [noun] definition: somebody who commits money only to help people in need : a person, company, or other organization that has money invested, only to help people in need, without expecting any financial returns, but a happy face.

lender.name: Lars K.
lender.loan_because: I believe empowering individuals is one of several good ways to create development in Africa

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I believe in free enterprise. Business creates jobs, jobs free people.
lender.occupational_info: I help others sell their goods or services.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: l like the idea the 100% of the ammount goes to people who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: l am the co-owner of an carpenter / constructionfirm with 35 employees

lender.name: Hanny
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: zoo animal registration, transport, studbooks

lender.name: Patricia & Maarten
lender.loan_because: KIVA´s micro-credit service is a great iniative that allows individuals such as us to support small enterprises across the world with small loans. We have previously loaned to a food production/sales store in Nigeria, a clothing store in Ghana, a cattle farm and a wine farm in Azerbaijan, to name a few. All businesses repaid their loans within a year with small monthly payments. With only a few hundred dollars we have already loaned to more than 25 individuals and groups across the world.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: it allows me to connect in a direct and personal way with people in other parts of the world and to help them fulfill their entrepreneurial dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I run the legal department in an acute care hospital system called Lahey Clinic. It is based just outside of Boston, Massachusetts, USA. There are real estate, employment, regulatory, contractual and other issues at Lahey Clinic that require the help of lawyers. The members of the legal department provide that help.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to support themself and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I research medicine for cancer.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I help organisations to perform better, mostly in the public sector.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do, and you can help people in need. Also many people are less fourtunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Walnut Hills High School. The subjects I take range from Band to Latin.

lender.name: Toine+Annemarie
lender.loan_because: Be true to yourself and you ll never fall.............
lender.occupational_info: Lawyer

lender.name: Scott Asch
lender.loan_because: Power to the People!
lender.occupational_info: Id rather be windsurfing.

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a farm
lender.occupational_info: I am a twice retired farmer engineering and then from farming in Virgina

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: God has taken care of us and we want to take care of others because of His love...

lender.name: Carol Cisecki
lender.loan_because: Today is my first step to helping my neighbours around the world.

lender.name: Avoco AS
lender.loan_because: We understand the need of financing when starting up a business. This is a brilliant way to assist other people in arhchieving their plans for a better future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Founders of computer programming company.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: We all go to heaven on the wings of those we've helped. -Kerouac

lender.name: Stefano
lender.loan_because: I think that helping others to grow is a fair use of our small and great wealth
lender.occupational_info: I can inform customers about ecological and economic advantages of using photovoltaic systems and propose the installation

lender.name: Dave Higgs-Vis
lender.loan_because: I was born into privilege. I don't believe I'm special because of it. Rather, I think we have all been born into abundance. I have the opportunity to share what I have been given, and I give thanks that I can. Jah Bless!
lender.occupational_info: I make food. I like to make simple food. I believe that the ingredients should be the focus. These ingredients should be fresh and local.

lender.name: sara
lender.loan_because: it feels right to me
lender.occupational_info: I work for an agency committed to ending violence. Our work helps those who have been abused and provides education on violence prevention .

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It\\\'s great to be able to help ordinary people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently training to be a minister (priest) in the Church of England.

lender.name: Julie Seidell
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to be able to help people who are working to make their own lives better.
lender.occupational_info: self employed jewelry designer.

lender.name: Morten
lender.loan_because: It’s great to know where your money goes - and to get feedback on the success. Also, I believe that loans increases the feeling of responsibility in the loan taker. Hence, it is a better aid than just giving the money away.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I was once helped by someone who owed me nothing and I wish to pass along the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I write about motorcycles and travel. I help people prepare their motorcycles for journeys around my country and around the world.

lender.name: Christine
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer for The Nature Conservancy.

lender.name: Philip & Jenisel
lender.loan_because: We all need help to realize our dreams.

lender.name: Lori
lender.occupational_info: I work with dental patients that suffer from disease of the gums to help them learn how important it is to properly take care of the surrounding tissues of the their teeth.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference in people's lives

lender.name: Corrie
lender.loan_because: I feel that one of the best ways to support economic equality and responsible commerce is to support small and family-owned businesses-- at home as well as abroad. If that support can also help a family improve its economic situation or quality of life, all the better.
lender.occupational_info: I help homeless teens and young adults find employment and further their education.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It sounds like a cool thing to do in the why not category. It makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English Second Language and run a comedy website

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I am aware that what little I have to share can be a great amount for someone else. I am lucky my country is stable and has a strong currency. I know I am fortunate to be able to work to take care of myself and I appreciate the entrepreneurial desires of the kiva community of borrowers.
lender.occupational_info: I drive to my client\'s home and set up my massage bed/table. I place sheets and a blanket on it. I turn on relaxing music and leave the room to wash my hands while the client climbs onto the table. I return and, using sesame oil, I massage their head, arms, hands, legs, feet, back, and hips, one part at a time. I leave the room to wash again while the client gets up and puts on a robe. Then the client pays me & I take my table and drive to the next client.

lender.name: Brent & Heather
lender.loan_because: ...of a Frontline World piece we saw on Kiva. Govermental (top-down) influence is clearly not enough to create positive change in the developing world. Person-to-person (bottom-up) assistance in any form is needed, and Kiva is a great example.
lender.occupational_info: Heather is in the process of starting her own business - an exercise studio - so she is living first-hand the difficulties involved. Brent has worked for various internet companies for over 10 years, and he sees Kiva as a wonderful application of internet technology.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help people that know what they want to do, but just do not yet have the resources to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the Information Technology Infrastructure in a major hotel in Chicago.

lender.name: quinn
lender.loan_because: We are all one human family, only love can nurture our family.
lender.occupational_info: Music is my passion and I help to write,play, and produce music with a message of love. I want to improve my community,myself and the world,

lender.name: anders
lender.loan_because: I want to support poor people, I have so much and they have so little. This seems to be te best way to give your support without involving The World Bank, croked politicians and government officials.
lender.occupational_info: I have a hard physical work, building houses and carrying building materials to the workers, cleaning up, and make sure people around me are i a good mood.

lender.name: Sailesh
lender.loan_because: I am a believer in MicroFinance as way of helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I lead Payments Systems design and strategy for a major UK bank

lender.name: Jan en Hilde Breed Vos
lender.loan_because: We should support people who take their responsibility and try to make steps forward!
lender.occupational_info: Jan: manager at the Free University, Amsterdam. Hilde: was secretary municipal welfare. Unfortunately Hilde died some time ago. But her name will live on in this KIVA-account!

lender.name: Gielis
lender.loan_because: (if succesfull) it leads to a sustainable future

lender.name: Fabienne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Gezinus
lender.loan_because: I\'m interested in people worldwide, especially what drives them to get a better life. Healtcare is always dependent on good economic circumstances and that is why I want to help small businesses in developing countrys
lender.occupational_info: I am a docter in a healthcarecenter in the Netherlands

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help get books, movies, and audio books to people in Massachusetts.

lender.name: Brigitte
lender.loan_because: it's a pleasure to support woman all over the world.

lender.name: Ellen & Willem
lender.loan_because: we want a better world and people to people contact.

lender.name: Mart & Annemarie
lender.loan_because: We lend because we want to make a little difference to people who need and deserve it. We have had all the opportunities we could wish for, so now it is time to help create opportunities for others.
lender.occupational_info: Mart is a selfemployed trainer/coach, Annemarie is the receptionist at the Dutch Opera.

lender.name: Boaz
lender.loan_because: I believe in donating directly to the people by making microloans.
lender.occupational_info: Business devlopment in a biotechnology company.

lender.name: Heleen
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving and taking a helping hand and because this is a great way of making the world a smaller place with bigger opportunities for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Designing information rich applications that offer a good user experience, for example making a website that everybody can easily access and use.

lender.name: Nini and Ton
lender.loan_because: We like to help people in the Third World by giving them a chance to earn their money. So they can live and can let study their children. Besides you can see how they use their loan.

lender.name: Claudio
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying engineering, that's all.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I want to share and help
lender.occupational_info: I am an independent ICT-manager.

lender.name: Matthijs
lender.loan_because: I want to give people an opportunity to change their lives
lender.occupational_info: Giving visually impaired people in developing countries access to information

lender.name: Carole Tessier
lender.loan_because: "We must be the change we wish to see in the world" —Gandhi

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have the chance to help people who are working hard to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher.

lender.name: Marjolijn en Ronald
lender.loan_because: We know how difficult it can be to get a loan.
lender.occupational_info: We do a lot of thinking (and designing) for various enterprises. Like a new businessname, striking advertisements or a particular logo.

lender.name: Carina
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to build a life for themselves

lender.name: Gerrit
lender.loan_because: In the Netherlands Princess Maxima did a good job in promoting microcredit loans
lender.occupational_info: I own a small software office developping administrative tools in education

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I read the book \"The End of Global Poverty\" and was inspired to do more to help poverty in Africa.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Sierra Club which works in the U.S. to protect clean air, clean water, and wild spaces.

lender.name: Els
lender.loan_because: I want to help somebody to fulfill her/his dream
lender.occupational_info: I do spiritual work like aurahealing, aurareading and soul retrieval.

lender.name: mary
lender.loan_because: I would like to help other people to realize their ideas and wishes.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Dutch as a second language, so I met people from different countries.

lender.name: Kees
lender.loan_because: Helping doesn\'t get any easier than this! The internet at it\'s best, bringing people together.

lender.name: Sandra en Patrick
lender.loan_because: This site just won my heart when I first read about it in a paper. I like the idea of actually seeing the people that set up their businesses with a little help from us and a lot of courage and determination from themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Officework

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity. Everyone should be entitled to follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I provide advice, guidance, and structure to businesses.

lender.name: Wei
lender.loan_because: i believe it will make difference to those who work hard.
lender.occupational_info: i\'m from China, now studying in U.S.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I design and write software that allows people to do things more quickly on the computer than by hand.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I think this a great way to help people. And I like that you can chose who to lend to and to which kind of businesses the money goes to. I think in that way you can have a relatively big effect on an individual, local level
lender.occupational_info: I am working with local authorities and stakeholders to improve the rural economy in Groningen (Netherlands), realizing all kinds of projects on agriculture, tourism, landscape and watermanagement. Key to success is cooperation and doing that bottum-up, with individuals (\'fire souls\') living in villages and towns. And that\'s what I like about Kiva too, because the enterpreneurs are \'fire souls\' too who can make a difference.

lender.name: UNBB
lender.occupation: Group of Finnish uni mates (School of Economics)
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can. Microloan is one of the most effective ways to help people help themselves. It is also truly exiciting and interesting to see how people’s standards of living develop.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of people (Group of Finnish uni mates, Helsinki School of Economics) wanting to do something to help people who live in poverty. We work in several fields in Finland (and also in Barbados and UK): banking, IT, finance, journalism, public relations, communications, EU, foreign ministry.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me, so I want bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I design stuff.

lender.name: Frida, Harrie and Ruben
lender.loan_because: Because it is nice to help other people.And Kiva is just the right organisation for us, to have feeling with real projects and development of the entrepeneurs.
lender.occupational_info: We Harrie and Frida work in ICT and Finance. Ruben is our son he goes to school and Play's Baseball with the Pirates in Amsterdam

lender.name: Vaughn
lender.loan_because: "From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked."
lender.occupational_info: I do research and teach mathematics.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: The world might last a little longer if we just help each other out. KIVA is an easy way to lend a hand and make the world a better place. I don't care who you are or where you live, we're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fireman and an emergency medic. I have been one a very long time and now I teach younger people how to do this work. Finding another way to help is really exciting.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be able to and others were not as lucky but just as (if not more) hard working as I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently teaching in London, England because there are not many teaching opportunities elsewhere

lender.name: Jacob
lender.occupation: Student / National Bank of Denmark / teacher
lender.loan_because: I believe this system is one of the best in erasing poverty in the long run from the worldmap.
lender.occupational_info: I study math and economics, Is placed in a project-evaluating group in a NGO wich mainly operates in India and work work every 2. weekend with children with special needs.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: It really feels like your helping those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Air Traffic Controller

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to see a greener future for developing countries and I think Kiva is an awesome way to connect people!
lender.occupational_info: Clean Energy Development in Latin America

lender.name: Erica
lender.occupation: Dean at an University of Applied Science
lender.loan_because: Labour and education...two essential needs to make life better. I want to make my contribution to that. Here, in Holland, and -however small- to people in other parts of the world

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I strongly support people that take the risc and grab the opportunity to start a business.
lender.occupational_info: Its my job to implement and maintain efficient business processes for a large Dutch media buying agency.

lender.name: Marius
lender.occupation: retired vice president university of Groningen
lender.loan_because: it feels good, women are the best to invest in
lender.occupational_info: together with my retired partner we started an investment fund for modern art

lender.name: Rona
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in a place of opportunity. Therefore, I believe it is my responsibility to share and help others. I also want to make this world a better place for my granchildren.

lender.name: Businessbox
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs must to support othter entrepreneurs whenever they can!
lender.occupational_info: marketing/communication consultancy

lender.name: Arcola KoreanAmericans
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea. How could we NOT do this?

lender.name: Robert Jan
lender.loan_because: it can change lifes. And it makes me feel connected to people who started their lifes with less chances than me. A small help for a better world.

lender.name: Tyrie
lender.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift, and I love to loan because I can\'t tell if I am helping someone survive or helping someone realize a dream, but I know we all need both, so it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an art museum where a lot of big shows, dinners, and parties are held. I plan the invitations and promotions for these events.

lender.name: Jon Pfleiderer
lender.loan_because: It is a good way to help people around the world.

lender.name: YPO Chicago Teens
lender.loan_because: we care
lender.occupational_info: we\'re students, we don\'t really work

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I am a disabled veteran of decidedly modest means and was delighted to find a way to make small loans to entrepreneurs, particularly women involved in food production/distribution. I'm not Bill Gates, but I still can help people.
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I have heard of Kiva thru a friend and it seems like a great way to help people get business up and running.
lender.occupational_info: I am as sales rep. for a major decorative fabric company. I worked for this company for 41 years. We sell decorative fabrics to interior designers and window covering companies and we also manufacture window coverings and bedspreads.

lender.name: Patti & Joel
lender.loan_because: we believe this is a great way to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Joel worked for the railroad. He was a brakeman and a conductor. Patti worked lots of jobs over the years and now stays at home happily.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: everyone should be able to earn an honest living with grace and dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 18 children ranging in age from 6 -11, at a small, rural school. I have been teaching for 21 years and have taught/lived in the USA and Africa.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: That darn Frontline show featuring Kiva and the microloans really got to me.
lender.occupational_info: Radio announcer for a country music station in the Milwaukee, Wisconsin, area.

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: this is real economic development\\r\\ni studied it in school. this puts it in practice\\r\\n
lender.occupational_info: tax accounting for small business owners. hopefully, those in other parts of the world don't have as many government rules and regulations to follow as we do!

lender.name: Sana
lender.loan_because: Because we care.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe that a portion of every dollar earned should go toward giving.

lender.name: Edgar
lender.loan_because: I\'ve been on the other side and know that even the smallest contribution (economic or otherwise), at the right time, can mean the difference between eating dinner...or eating your nails.
lender.occupational_info: I help business-people understand the causes of a problem and help them make more informed decisions to reduce risk and improve their chances of success.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves is good for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: My kids say I help catch the bad guys.

lender.name: Jay & Doug
lender.loan_because: This is an excellent way to spread the true meaning of free enterprise & democracy. Help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Edward and Catherine
lender.loan_because: we are so blessed and believe it is our responsibility to help and support those trying to improve the quality of their lives.

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because: When I was a single mom, God put many angels in my life when I needed help most. I prayed, that when I was able, God would use me as an angel to help others. I try to never pass up an opportunity to give back what has been given to me.

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: Given the opportunity and a fair lending environment people can sustain themselves long term. Kiva provides that and I am honored to lend.
lender.occupational_info: I make video games. Seriously. :-)

lender.name: Duane
lender.occupation: Asst. Prof. Emily Carr Institute of Art & Design
lender.loan_because: I teach issues of social justice and equity as part of a course on Global Design.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to do it.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn’t I?

lender.name: Stewart
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that my donations work multiple times!
lender.occupational_info: I mentor / coach students who have entrepreneurial and business ideas.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: I build houses.

lender.name: Penny & Julian
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs someone.
lender.occupational_info: Julian writes computer software for the developement of medical equipment and Penny is training to become a Pilates instructor.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: If I was born in a country with few opportunities, or if my children were born there, I would hope that someone would help me / them.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers

lender.name: Guillaume
lender.occupational_info: writing software (free software in particular), taking photos

lender.name: Daniel Hostetler
lender.loan_because: I believe in small business with all my heart. I had a business because somebody lent money to me and I am pushing the favor forward.
lender.occupational_info: I help small business owners succeed by walking side-by-side with them through the accomplishment of their goals

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel like I am helping someone. I have been very fortunate and need to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I sell a line of designer handbags called Beijo.

lender.name: Shayne
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: I work in retail in the arts, so I love to support others in creative pursuits!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is a simple, good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach fifth grade.

lender.name: Hadley
lender.loan_because: I am able. I am so greatful for everyone in my life that has helped me get amazing opportunities and am thankful to be able to 'pay it forward' in any way possible.
lender.occupational_info: I plan celebrations for big groups of people on our yachts on Lake Michigan in Chicago

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: kiva deserves my support
lender.occupational_info: adviser for modern art

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I want to help motivated people to improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: My company buys telecom equipment for re-usage and sells refurbished parts in Europe.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupational_info: Graduate student in business

lender.name: Alfred
lender.loan_because: it is a joy to help people who try to make their lifes better
lender.occupational_info: I'm helping refugees who are coming from over the world to my country with their juridical and social problems

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It is a blessing to be able to give
lender.occupational_info: I establish the value of real estate.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of microcredit and love the opportunity to be able to help other women all around the world.
lender.occupational_info: My business, The Modern Goddess is about empowering and inspiring women through personal and spiritual development. I love helping people grow, develop and move forward in their life.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: more than anything else, I believe in this truth stated by Anthropologist Margaret Mead: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
lender.occupational_info: I am a part-time graduate student studying environmental policy to help make the world a cleaner, healthier, safer place for you and me to live. When I am not at school, I do administrative computer and paperwork for a University office to help pay my bills! :)

lender.name: Sarkozy-Banoczy Family
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: We develop institutions and programs for Native people in support of small business, homeownership and other asset building activities.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: Those who have have begun a small business have already invested. They have demonstrated their ability to imagine(and work for), a better future. These are people motivated to make the most of an opportunity. They are already leaders, and encourage others. They will compound an investment and invest in someone else, because business works best when it works for everyone...
lender.occupational_info: I cover the glass of a picture frame with fabric, and pin just the right piece of jewelry on it, so it can be enjoyed when it is not being worn.

lender.name: Linda and Greg
lender.loan_because: It is important to invest in people. Being able to help is a blessing. It is also in memory of my beloved Oma.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: even a little bit can make a difference around the world.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want other people to be given opportunities to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Very busy mom who takes care of 3 children - 2 of them are small; the other is in high school.

lender.name: Michelle Kreger
lender.loan_because: Its so amazing to be able to connect to an entrepreneur on the other side of the world with just a few clicks. I love the stories, and I love being able to do my part to make the world a little flatter.
lender.occupational_info: I work with an incredible team of people to grow our MFI partner base and get organizations across the globe excited to partner with Kiva. I love my job because each day I get to innovate and grow alongside my colleagues to make Kiva a better experience for our partners, our lenders and the entrepreneurs we serve.

lender.name: Laetitia and Martijn
lender.loan_because: we need a better world

lender.name: ralf
lender.loan_because: i borrow

lender.name: Alexandre
lender.loan_because: i loan because I am fortunate enough to be able to...it is the least I can do...and I hope that it will encourage others to make efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I build foundations for all types of industrial building projects.\\r\\n

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: To put in my grain of sand and help improve someone else's life

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: it means a new impulse to small businesses and therefore to communities and people's lives. Moreover, one can fairly easily contribute to someone's success and help make a way of life sustainable.
lender.occupational_info: 1) Optimization of organization's processes in the services industry 2) Building businesses from Concept Phase, through Business Case to Opening Party

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It is a simple way to help create value for other parts of the world that can use help in making a better life for everyone. I also feel that it is a much better model than charity, as people develop, rather than surrender their dignity as they get the help they need to improve their lives. Then again, a number of people have invested in me over the years...it's a good habit.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies use technology to build better solutions for, and relationships with, customers.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with many good things in life and I want to give back, especially to people who are trying to make a better life for themselves. Also, my wife and I were business owners when we were younger. I know the difficulties we faced when looking for money to start and run our business. I want to help out anyway I can.
lender.occupational_info: I\\\'m a news reporter for a radio station in Cincinnati, Ohio. I do local newscasts during our morning news show. I get up at about 3:30 in the morning so I can be to work by about 4:30. Once I\\\'m finished with my newscasts, I spend the rest of my day interviewing people from government officials to community leaders and business officials so I can write news stories that run on the station. I\\\'ve been doing this kind of work for more than 20 years. I went to college at the University of Dayton and studied radio/television broadcasting.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: This is what we feel we are supposed to do.
lender.occupational_info: Engineering

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: This is a really cool concept and it is nice to know that all my money is going to those individuals who actually need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying Business, so microfinance is fascinating to me.

lender.name: BEEZY
lender.loan_because: i feel that people need oppurtunities to fulfill there goals. Everyone needs a chance. We need to put more faith in PEOPLE!!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a rapper / producer!!! www.coldwarrecords.com / www.myspace.com/352beez

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I have been an entrepreneur for 30 years and very fortunate to have success - It is great to help others get a foundation of independence through a business they own and control. Kiva is a great way to do it because you are connecting with the folks in need in the most direct fashion.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business person and an engineer (computer software and hardware) - have been doing it for 30 years - I love to start small businesses and help others grow their businesses.

lender.name: Eduardo
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that we can help each other in this world. In addition, I want to see other succed!

lender.name: B Family
lender.loan_because: we realize everyone needs help at some time or another, including us. At this time we are fortunate enough that we can be the ones helping.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: money is like manure - it doesn't do anything unless you spread it around making small things grow.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I like helping people serve their communities through their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students to write better.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping individuals working to improve their - and other people's - lives.

lender.name: Karel
lender.loan_because: It's simple, effective, and supports development in the way I like.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student in Seattle, USA, studying geography.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I have personally witnessed the impact that small loans can make in devoloping countries.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I love seeing people around the world use their talents to build successful businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my day raising my three kids. In my bits of spare time, I love to design and sew clothing.

lender.name: RecklessLove
lender.loan_because: 1 John 3:17. But whoever has the world\'s goods, and beholds his brother in need and closes his heart against him, how does the love of God abide in him?
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a great Christian college, studying things and figuring out how to live a life of reckless love

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people become self-sufficient. We are blessed with prosperity in this country and I want to share it with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a home to buy and I help people who already own a home to sell it.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Ethics is about fair public processes that help enable others to follow their individual dreams and values
lender.occupational_info: Computer guy, also involved with Audubon Society

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Access to capital is one type of infrastructure that can help lift a country from poverty.

lender.name: Bob&Rosemary
lender.loan_because: Feels Good

lender.name: thor
lender.loan_because: I hope for a better world
lender.occupational_info: I work at the national tv station in Denmark

lender.name: selah
lender.loan_because: KIVA advocate from the start - grab an account, throw in 50 bucks and START LENDING!!!
lender.occupational_info: entertainment industry

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help out!

lender.name: Michiel
lender.loan_because: During my work for development cooperations all over the world with energy projects I discovered that the small things are more succesfull than the big ones. As a human/christian we need to help our fellow people!
lender.occupational_info: Consultant for technical and organizational problems. Nowadays I am also photographer; see my website. My wife is a professional piano-player.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Life is good.

lender.name: Ru Klein
lender.loan_because:
It feels good to be part of other people's life in a positive way.
I also manage the credit my parents Wim en Nel Klein from Santpoort in the Netherlands wish to lend.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lecturer in tertiary education: intercultural communication, informatics, and interaction design.

lender.name: Lollipop
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about financing small businesses that have a direct impact on improving people's quality of lives. I believe in empowering these borrowers and allowing them to use my capital to take steps toward achieving their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I assess the quality of businesses and make investment recommendations.

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: I provide management, operations and technical consulting services for urban and rural transport and mass transit programs throughout the world.

lender.name: Kyu & Cailee
lender.loan_because: I'm thankful for God's blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Clinton
lender.loan_because: It is nice to make change for the better and to see directly how your money is used.
lender.occupational_info: I sell tickets for the theatre.

lender.name: Christopher Harris
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I may not have much, but there are so many people in this world who have less and if I can make a small difference I will. My hope is that those to whom we loan will pass it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teenagers in an Upward Bound Program. It exists to help kids who wish to be the first in their family to attend college.

lender.name: God's Glory
lender.loan_because:
Romans 11:36a — “For from him and through him and to him are all things ...”
Luke 12:15-17a, 19b-21, 33 — “Then he said to them, ‘Watch out! Be on your guard against all kinds of greed; a man’s life does not consist in the abundance of his possessions.’ And he told them this parable: ‘The ground of a certain rich man produced a good crop. He thought to himself, ... “[I] have plenty of good things laid up for many years. Take life easy; eat, drink and be merry.” But God said to him, “You fool! This very night your life will be demanded from you.” This is how it will be with anyone who stores up things for himself but is not rich toward God. ... Sell your possessions and give to the poor. Provide purses for yourselves that will not wear out, a treasure in heaven that will not be exhausted, where no thief comes near and no moth destroys. ...’ ”
Luke 3:8a, 10-11 — “ ‘Produce fruit in keeping with repentance ...’ ... ‘What should we do then?’ the crowd asked. John answered, ‘The man with two tunics should share with him who has none, and the one who has food should do the same.’ ”
John 3:16 — “For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.”

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: God and so many have invested in me.
lender.occupational_info: I provide computer support for professors at Stanford University.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do to help people who are working hard to help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a government agency to administer laws that protect the air, the water, and the land from harm caused by large scale development.

lender.name: thomas and liz
lender.loan_because: Liz, Chamberlin and I feel blessed to lend to others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are struggling to find meaning in their life, deal with loss and pain, and grow in healthy ways.

lender.name: Nicolas Fournier
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that 100% of my money goes to those in the world that need it the most. Microfinance is a great way to help people achieve financial independence.

lender.name: julio
lender.loan_because: I want to share the abundance I have received to help others

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to help these individuals "get their foot in the door."
lender.occupational_info: I work to match local students and young adults find and keep work.

lender.name: Paul & Cile
lender.loan_because: To give opportunities to people to make their life a little bit better.
lender.occupational_info: We are working for the inhabitants of the city of Rotterdam, young and old.

lender.name: banduki
lender.loan_because: The best flutes should go to the best flute players because flutes exist to be played well
lender.occupational_info: Someday I will plant a grove of Jacarandas

lender.name: Rachel's Dad
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with the ability to help others.

lender.name: Alen
lender.loan_because: I do this because I can. Hopefully what to me is a relatively small thing can have a major impact for someone else. I hope that my small effort can enable people not born into the same privileged society as myself to achieve success.
lender.occupational_info: I protect computers against hackers.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to use technology to improve the world.
lender.occupational_info: I link computers together in networks to improve information sharing for businesses and government.

lender.name: Valentin
lender.loan_because: In the US, we sometimes feel like we have a lot of problems with which to deal. We are so detached from the rest of the world, we often don\'t realize that people in other parts of the world have far less and have to deal with problems we can\'t even imagine. The U.S. government and the people of the U.S. need to do more to share the wealth. Kiva.org is a wonderful start.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: to make sure people in need get money and I think it is great
lender.occupational_info: I am in 7th grade I really like to go fishing and play with my friends i also love break dancing and playing guitar

lender.name: Joe Dirt
lender.loan_because: I like this idea because all the individuals here are trying to help themselves, not just looking for a handout.

lender.name: Ghislain
lender.loan_because: To show my students how it works. I love Mexican people. Hopefully, it will help !
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a University professor (Management and Development Finance)

lender.name: Ginger Grant
lender.loan_because: I have a passion for small business - and every little business can have a huge impact. It is a small price to pay to help another entrepreneur - perhaps my little version of pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students and also have my own consulting business. It is hard work but worth it! Every one of us in our own way is making the world a better place through our businesses. That is my hope anyway!

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I want to know that I did what I could, when I could.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Fashion.

lender.name: TCAL
lender.loan_because: I love entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: it makes me want to dance!

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: As a business owner, I admire the courage and discipline it takes to start a business - but also the financial burden required. I have been blessed with good fortune and wish to share it with others.
lender.occupational_info: I take items people have to sell on consignment to get them a fair price. I also educate young adults about finance.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I am also a debtor; God has ransomed me with the infinite price of His Son (Jesus).

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I think this is a really cool way to help people out directly and connect me with those that I help out.
lender.occupational_info: I optimize websites to achieve good rankings in the search engines as well as facilitating my work through programming.

lender.name: Gavin
lender.loan_because: This isn't charity, this isn't a handout -- it's a chance to help hard working people help themselves.

lender.name: Fu
lender.loan_because: Anne suggested me to.

lender.name: Mat
lender.loan_because: I want to help at least a little.

lender.name: Rosalind
lender.loan_because: I have the resources, he has the need.
lender.occupational_info: I help single parent ladies regain their independence. I care for cancer patients in their final days. I worry about bringing up three teenage boys.

lender.name: Sandeep
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in small borrowers being more focused, hardworking and honest.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Financial Consultant .

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone else in getting started with a business. I hope that they can move forward and make a change in their lives.
lender.occupational_info:
Right my now business is a small lawn care company. I cut grass, fertilize and maintain peoples yards.
I also purhcase property, renovate it and flip it to make a profit.
My real passion right now is music and DJ'ing. I perform in front of the crowd and love it!!! I feel so alive. I would love to pursue this and Im currently looking inot how to go about making money from my passion.

lender.name: Jan Willem
lender.loan_because: we all are connected on this one world

lender.name: Agnes
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: Francis Larkin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find jobs using the Internet.

lender.name: Wiel
lender.loan_because: I Love to help people to get on their feet. as a independent myself I know how difficult it is especially when you just start and as long as your business is small. I'm born and living in the more fortunate part of the world and very happy to find such a direct way to contribute to people who have the drive to stand up and change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I choose to be a tailor because the diversity of possibilities within the profession and because it gives me the possibility to earn a living anywhere in the world. and so I did. from independent designer/tailor in a small street in Amsterdam to productionmanager in china to creative patternmaker at Levis and everything inbetween.

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: The money I\'m loaning will go further this way than if I spend it on something for myself, and knowing that it can effect someone\'s life is powerful. I like that none of it goes to administrative fees. Those of us in affluent countries have the power to help others less fortunate and we should!!!
lender.occupational_info: I'm the global curator for newZonia.com, a new online community that connects creative people, companies, and nonprofits in a philanthropic ecomony. watch for us - coming soon!!! meanwhile check out our site.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I'm glad to have my money helping people in this way rather than sitting in the bank doing nothing much.
lender.occupational_info: I research how people think about important social and political issues, and how this affects their voting behaviour, using information from social surveys gathered all over the world

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. All too often, people have the attitude that someone else will help, and do nothing. But if we each were to make just a small contribution to help someone in need, we could change the world.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinance to encourage entrepreneurism rather than working for substandard wages.
lender.occupational_info: I work with hospital computer software.

lender.name: Anton & Ria
lender.occupation: labour inspector, dpt. Major Hazard Control

lender.name: Anton
lender.loan_because: I don\\\'t have much to give. I don\\\'t have time to do service to my fellow man. I NEED to do something to help. This is the PERFECT way to do it for me. Kiva ROCKS! Great Idea! God Bless you all!
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer that works very hard to support his family.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: 13 years ago a family in the moment of their greatest grief, agreed to donate their son's heart to me after his death so that I could live. I continue to be thankful for this amazing gift of life. Transplantation Works!

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Eric Martin
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor of management, focusing on international development assistance.

lender.name: mr. elsbree'sclass
lender.loan_because: we care about other people
lender.occupational_info: We learn about math, reading and writing in Mr. Elsbrees class in Brooklyn NY.

lender.name: El and Min
lender.loan_because: To help create a better world.
lender.occupational_info: Min is a freelance translator; El works in a college education department.

lender.name: Karen and Stephen
lender.loan_because: We're both artists who get immense satisfaction out of making things, and we want to help give other creative people the opportunity to use their talents as a means to support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Jennifer & Gary
lender.loan_because: I became interested in micro-lending when Muhammad Yunus won the Nobel Peace prize in 2006.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I run a technology services company in Chicago. Our mission is to provide the IT services to small and medium businesses that rival the services of much larger companies at a price the small market can afford.

lender.name: Sarah & Ross
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in atown north of Boston, MA. Sarah plays the clarinet and Ross the Trombone. Sarah likes Volleyball Soccer and Ross loves baseball. Our dog's name is Hugo,

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I support those that support themselves and see value in lending as opposed to gifting. I believe that providing a means for people to establish or grow a self sustaining activity is the most practical approach and will have the most long term beneficial effect.

lender.name: Cullen Family
lender.loan_because: We loan as a family to help support other families and their communities.

lender.name: Garret & Deeanne
lender.loan_because: Microfinance has the ability to change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: MyFarmer.com promotes sustainability and community supported agriculture. We help small farmers.

lender.name: Pax
lender.loan_because: I think this is a brilliant way to redistribute wealth and well-being without it being humiliating to the receiver or decreasing the prosperity of the giver.
lender.occupational_info: I plan & cook nutritious meals to keep my family healthy. I clean our home and our things each day. I take care of my children if they are sick. I help my husband advance in his career. I give our children love, education and safety. I keep our finances balanced. When I can, I put my inside vision onto a canvas with paint.

lender.name: Floris
lender.occupation: Senior policy advisor, and part-time judge
lender.loan_because: "[e]ach person you know about and can affect is someone to whom you have responsibilities: to say this is just to affirm the very idea of morality. The challenge, then, is to take minds and hearts formed over the long millennia of living in local troops and equip them with ideas and institutions that will allow us to live together as the global tribe we have become" (Kwame Appiah, Cosmopolitanism, 2006, p. xiii)

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I fell the need to help. Se also the site: www.myc4.com
lender.occupational_info: Metal worker in production of panelstands for bodyshops (cars). Small factory with export to several countries. I am also Mormon Bishop.

lender.name: Whitney and Jim
lender.loan_because: we can. And I think if you can, then you should. 25 dollars here isnt that much, but it can really change someones life in another country.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my children and keep the household going, while my husband works full time.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I help those that ask for a hand up, not a hand out. I admire people that work hard to improve life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I design the communications (phone, networks, voice, video) wire infrastructure that goes into buildings that are being refurbished/upgraded.

lender.name: Chuck & Mary-francis
lender.loan_because: ... I can!!!! It is something I have been interested in since I first read about the concept, but do not have the funds to make the kinds of investments that were necessary up until now.

lender.name: Amelia
lender.loan_because: Gratitude.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people and really liked this concept.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Nic & Angie
lender.loan_because: Reaching out a hand to help other people who work so hard to better their lives is a wonderful thing to do. Thanks to KIVA for coming up with this concept.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like a responsible citizen.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Social Ventures Inc.
lender.loan_because: Social Ventures Inc. benefits humanity
lender.occupational_info: We create, incubate or acquire socially responsible businesses (and make them if they are not) and donate a significant percentage of their gross proceeds to non-profits that help humanity.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: of our school prgrams and I like to.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Small Potatoes
lender.loan_because: Our family believes that our loans are a positive step that help others better their lives, realize their dreams and dream bigger dreams.
lender.occupational_info: We work for small family owned companies and work with great teams of people from many countries and backgrounds. We also volunteer with many groups near our home.

lender.name: Are and Hilde + 4 kids
lender.occupational_info: Journalist and oil industry professional

lender.name: miranda
lender.loan_because: i have enough to spare.
lender.occupational_info: i'm an americorps vista

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to make a difference, even if it's only small.

lender.name: Karin & Noud
lender.loan_because: We want to try if it really works...
lender.occupational_info: Noud: personal coaching, organisational consultancy\r\n\r\nKarin: Art-Historian

lender.name: Entre Club
lender.loan_because: Doing our part to change the world

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do to help.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I want to give financial assistance to those who honestly need a little help, and who in turn can make a difference in their family, city, or even country.
lender.occupational_info: A pilot in the United States Air Force.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: this is exactly the kind of no-brainer way to help people in the developing world that everyone can do. It is effective and makes a huge difference in the lives of people struggling to feed their families. It is a good complement to the work I do on a daily basis at Bread for the World.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of online giving for the Children's Hospital Foundation. We are the fundraising arm of Children's National Medical Center, which plays a vital role in improving the health of children in the nation’s capital, across the country, and around the world.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I think loaning is our moral obligation as blessed people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a part of the government that helps organize planes in the sky.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed all my life by having enough money to afford housing, education, and life basics. Kiva is such a great and wonderful idea, and I am glad to be able to help those less fortunate but willing to work hard to better their lot in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Helpdesk representative supporting software for automobile dealerships across the Nation and Canada.

lender.name: Lone A
lender.loan_because: I like to do something nice for those who are not as lucky as I am. And here I have the oppotunity. I think it is a great idea.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: Because we're all on this same little planet together.

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: It\'s such an opportunity to make a difference in someone\'s life. I\'ve been lucky that people have believed in me and have helped me get to where I\'m now, and it\'s time to pay it forward. Helping someone makes me happy.

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: ...everyone needs a helping hand at least once in their life. I have been lucky to have helpful and supportive family and friends, and good fortune should be shared.
lender.occupational_info: I am a personal assistant for a man that owns a couple of his own businesses, as well as help people find and sell their homes in my spare time.

lender.name: Kayte
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I push papers

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: a small loan from me makes a big difference to someone else.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: As an owner of a fashion-related business, it makes me really happy to help another woman who creates accessories and runs her own business.
lender.occupational_info: I provide personal styling services to men and women who want to improve their style and image. I perform color analysis, style analysis, wardrobe planning and personal shopping.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: it is such a direct way to help people.

lender.name: Steve and Dale
lender.loan_because: We loan because we believe strongly in the opportunities that micro-finance can deliver to those not as fortunate us ourselves. It also helps us stay in touch as we move on from uni!
lender.occupational_info: We make ideas happen...

lender.name: Jenney
lender.loan_because: I want to alleviate suffering and create peace.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother and that takes a lot of my time.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I see it as chance to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Berke
lender.loan_because: I want to help others gain the types of privilages that I am so blessed to have now.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student furthering my studies in business to one day start my own business.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I like to help people achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help people build a road map to achieve their financial goals.

lender.name: Antonio
lender.loan_because: I believe that when we help others it comes back to us in so many ways.
lender.occupational_info: The job title is missleading. At one time I used to work loading tapes into STK tape drives that used tapes, 3490\\\'s, similar to old 8-Track tapes. My job consisted of watching a computer screen where tapes numbers flashed. I would then write the numbers down and pull them from a tape library.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: so little money can change someone's life in ways that amaze me.

lender.name: Merry Jo
lender.loan_because:
They've got the seed. I add a little fertilizer. They raise the crop. I get to participate in their success. We all win.
I like supporting women's enterprises because they have the hardest time getting financial support through traditional channels.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a professional photo lab. I manage large orders of kids' school photos on the computer. I also do photo retouching and computer artwork. I'm working to build my own business making and selling jewelry.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.occupational_info: I work for the University of Notre Dame

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to help others take care of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a health insurance provider. I help the company manage its data.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: Because helping others to help themselves is always a good thing.

lender.name: Timmy
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: melanie
lender.loan_because: my brother told me to...and it is a cool thing to do. I want my son to learn about giving too!
lender.occupational_info: I write about travelling around the world.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: I want to fund the entrepreneurs of the third world!

lender.name: Ria
lender.loan_because: It is important that other people get a change for a better live and to develope themselves and their famely.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small toeristical business. And I am mother of 5 children and 8 grand children.

lender.name: Sven Ternov
lender.loan_because: I find the KIVA concept a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: Human factors specialist in air traffic navigation.. PhD student Lund Institute of Technology. Student of history at Lund University.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: even the most promising business idea/plan will fail if you do not have access to necessary funds to get it started. and could there be any better than to directly support entrepreneurs in ameliorating their families future prospects far away from our secure homes and lifes?
lender.occupational_info: owning and running a restaurant

lender.name: Maud
lender.loan_because: You'll never know when you will need help - so I am grateful I am able to lean and do not need to borrow...

lender.name: amedeo
lender.loan_because: I want to be of help. I believe kiwa to be a clever way to improve the life of people and to make the world a better place
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer and I specialize in digital prints for advertisment and expositions

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and Kiva makes it easy.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping other people. It is truly rewarding to do this. I believe that if you can give a little , your heart and soul will be rewarded 100 times over!
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom who tries to help in my community and I am so glad I found this site.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to see dreams and small businesses thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I embroider and work with computers to create educational materials for machine embroiderers.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. I help people get on the internet, use email and do business with their computers.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: as a group of high school students, we want to help people trying to improve the lives of themselves and others in their community

lender.name: Maxine
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wonderful Mother and Aunt. Who Listens well,gives advise and cares about others and their lives. I love life and look forward to its challenges and rewards.

lender.name: Dancers Hearth
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a difference in individual lives. We loan because Kiva is a great idea. We loan because Kiva has made it possible.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of like minded friends who hold the earth and her inhabitants sacred.

lender.name: Devon
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I want to serve the greater-good.

lender.name: Aleksandr
lender.loan_because: A first-generation immigrant from Eastern Europe, I know the difference that a few dollars could make. I am grateful for an opportunity to make this difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals and organizations reach their highest potential. In the process, I grow by learning from them.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Even the curmudgeonly should recognize common sense. If you have not lent yet, take the plunge.
lender.occupational_info: Online adversting

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky to get a loan or two from time to time, and I'm lucky to be able to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I've got some TV gear and I've figured out a way to get jobs helping people make television commercials, programs, and behind the scenes stuff on feature films.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving others a hand up and I want to teach my grandchildren to do the same
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired child/Family therapist/counselor. I helped children and families solve their problems and live happier lives for 15 years and more.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: Give a someone a fish and you feed him or her for a day. Teach a person to fish and you feed her or him for a lifetime.
